tweets.text:
Floods can destroy your most treasured possessions.

Taking a few simple steps now can help protect your home and family.

Don‚Äôt lose what you love to a flood: https://t.co/xKGAQ9Oqsr

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/AWlCNioPNv

If you live in a flood risk area you should be prepared for #flooding.
This #FloodActionWeek we want to make you aware that you can:
- Sign up for flood warnings
- Make a simple flood plan 
- Know what to do in a flood
Find out how at: https://t.co/ZEHl74ryiJ
#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/cJaWeSQXrV

Read all about Gordon Stewart, a volunteer for #Prudhoe flood warden group in #Northumberland who is also a county councillor. He talks about the attraction of being a flood warden and the importance of campaigns like #FloodActionWeek click for article https://t.co/bkRr55pdOB https://t.co/uOrLLNoqFo

Why don't you sign up for flood warnings from the @EnvAgency - it's a free service and could save your life!

More information can be found here https://t.co/UHZ1JynKp5

#FloodActionWeek https://t.co/TTdd2XGzys

Project update!

We have now installed rock rolls and coir rolls along the edge of the dyke channel to help protect the bank from erosionüëç

Read more: https://t.co/6xiuPyMFSe #Lincoln #Flood https://t.co/gzuxQcIYDs https://t.co/kFOJQq2FGE

Do you know what to do in a flood?

Make sure you know the simple steps to take if a Flood Alert, Flood Warning, or Severe Flood Warning is issued in your area üëá

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft 

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/Uj28BuYHVC

As flood resistance becomes more widely associated with public safety, well-being and financial security, how can stakeholders be sure that flood products are fit for purpose? Join us on the 25 November to find out more https://t.co/WP65NjjbVU https://t.co/oSlHIk23J8

Sadly approval to desecrate the Stonehenge World Heritage Landscape at Stonehenge may be about to happen & will ultimately trigger the most monumental waste of money on a scheme that will not serve purpose in any sense. But first a judicial review will take place. https://t.co/TPyLA1Azha

There are over 200,000 properties at risk of tidal flooding around the Humber, some of these surprisingly far inland. Don‚Äôt assume it‚Äôs not you. Check your risk! #PrepareActSurvive @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/llOVfU9SUa https://t.co/dQcwz03fP2

Accidents happen but it is important that you act fast when they do. 

If you lose control of your agricultural sprayer make sure you take immediate action to prevent leakage. 

You must block any drains or water course and then call our incident line 0800 807060.  #Farming https://t.co/mzDo7dA0i2
@cmfwood @EnvAgency @CCLtd You seem to have double the hours in a day that everyone else has!

Nature-based solutions are central to our #Routemap2030.

Our #NetZero plan will see the restoration of 20,000 hectares of owned peatland & grassland, as well as the planting of 11 million trees.

Find out more: https://t.co/kbbjxMluwT https://t.co/a0s0MnERMP

Would you know what to do in a #flood?

If you live in a flood risk area, make sure you're prepared and ready to act if a flood hit. 

Take a look at the @EnvAgency's advice here üëâ https://t.co/WF3X8gGfU6
